R13739-d-12-04-89-BS.Accident Cause: Lateral drawbar force on curve excessive, train handling
R13739-d-12-04-89-BS.Narrative: #2 GENERAL ROUSTER CREW, OPERATING ENGINES 220 AND 261 IN MULTIPLES, AFTER DOUBLING THEIR TRAIN WEREIN PROCESS OF SHOVING THEIR 112 CARS SOUTH TO CLEAR THE CSXT RAILROAD CROSSING AT 19TH STREET, ENSLEY, ALABAMA. EIGHT (8) EMPTY ARTICULATED FLAT CARS WERE POSITIONED NEXT TO THE ENGINES IN THE CONSIST OF 72 LOADS AND 40 EMPTIES. AS THE CREW SHOVED AGAINST THE 112-CAR TRAIN, THE FLAT CARS DERAILED AT CURVE. FOUR OF THE FLAT CARS DERAILED WITH DAMAGE TO DERAILED EQUIPMENT, BS TRACK AND NS TRACK. THE DERAILMENT WAS PROBABLY CAUSED BY EXCESSIVE LATERAL DRAWBAR FORCES WHEN SHOVING AGAINST THE CONSIST OF 72 LOADS AND 40 EMPTIES. NORFOLK SOUTHERN TRACK DAMAGE IS ESTIMATED AT $4400 AND WILL BE REPORTED UNDER THEIR INCIDENT NO. R-13739.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone

NA43-d-12-24-89-SOO.Primary Accident Cause: Failure to properly secure engine(s) (railroad employee)
NA43-d-12-24-89-SOO.Accident Cause: Failure to properly secure engine(s) (railroad employee)
NA43-d-12-24-89-SOO.Narrative: UNITS 6450/6400 WERE SET OUT AT EAST HASTINGS ON TRACK #1 BY CREW MEMBERS OF TRAIN #282, TO BE PICKED UP LATER BY ANOTHER TRAIN CREW AND TAKEN TO SAINT PAUL FOR REPAIRS. TRAIN #233 WAS INSTRUCTED TO PICK UP ENGINES, HOWEVER DUE TO AIR PROBLEMS (CONTINUOUS BLOW IN CONTROL STAND) ON UNIT 6400, ONLY UNIT 6450 WAS PICKED UP BY THE CREW OF TRAIN #223. AS TRAIN #280 WAS PASSING THROUGH EAST HASTINGS RUNNING OVER #2 MAIN WITH THREE UNITS, 110 LOADS AND NO HAZARDOUS MATERIALS, UNIT 6400 ROLLED EASTWARDAND INTO THE SIDE OF TRAIN #280 CAUSING THE DERAILMENT OF 30 CARS. THE DERAILMENT OF THE CARS CAUSEDDAMAGE TO THE VALVES OF TWO PERMANENT PROPANE STORAGE TANKS WHICH ARE USED TO PROVIDE FUEL FOR OURSWITCH HEATERS. OUTSIDE ASSISTANCE WAS CALLED UPON TO MAKE THE NECESSARY REPAIRS TO THE VALVES AND STOP THE LEAKING OF PROPANE. NO EVACUATION WAS NECESSARY FOR THE SITUATION. UNDER FRA REGULATIONS BLOOD/URINE TESTING WAS PERFORMED SHORTLY AFTER THE INCIDENT TO THE MEMBERS OF TRAIN #280 WITH ALL RESULTS BEING NEGATIVE. THERE WERE NO PROBLEMS ENCOUNTERED WITH THE TESTING.NoneNoneNoneNone
